document.full_text: pakistan's military has broken the back of militants linked to al qaeda and taliban, the country's powerful head of the army said in a speech on saturday that followed criticism from the united states that it wasn't doing enough to fight militancy.
document.title: pakistan army boss kayani says militants' back broken
lines_and_colors: pakistan's military has broken the back of militants linked to al qaeda and taliban, the country's powerful head of the army said in a speech on saturday that followed criticism from the united states that it wasn't doing enough to fight militancy.
